Examples
========

.. Caution::
    Don't copy and paste these codeblocks!

    Use them as **resources**, not as prebuilt bots.

.. Tip::
    guidelines for making these bots.

    Must be:

    - Understandable
        - no spaghetti code, or over-complicated logic
        - must adhere to PEP standards
    - Secure
        - must be actually safe to use
        - must not benefit the creator of the command
    - Useful
        - something someone might actually use
    - adhering to Discord TOS
        - no API abuse, rainbow roles, etc.
